SEARCH
Package photos.model

Class Users

java.lang.Object
photos.model.Users
public class Users extends Object
Central model class for managing all user-related data, including users list, albums and photos for each user, and user-defined tag types, which are all serialized and deserialized here, for the purpose of data persistence.
Author:
Harshi Oleti

  • Field Details

    • usersList

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<String> usersList
      This is the list of all registered usernames in the system. It is observable and used for dynamically updating UI components.

    • currentAlbum

      public static String currentAlbum
      The name of the album currently being viewed or edited. Used to track user navigation state.

    • currentPhoto

      public static String currentPhoto
      The path of the photo currently being viewed or selected. Useful for actions like tagging or captioning.

    • currentUser

      public static String currentUser
      The username of the user currently logged into the system.

    • userAlbums

      public static Map<String,Map<String,Album>> userAlbums
      A mapping of usernames to their corresponding albums. Each user maps to another map, where the album name maps to an Album object.

    • userTagTypes

      public static Map<String,Set<TagType>> userTagTypes
      A mapping of usernames to their custom-defined tag types. Helps enforce tag type constraints for each individual user.

    • Users

      public Users()

  • Method Details

    • initializeUserTagTypes

      public static void initializeUserTagTypes()
      Initializes the tag types map for each user.

    • saveUserTagTypes

      public static void saveUserTagTypes()
      saves custom tag types for all users to disk

    • loadUserTagTypes

      public static void loadUserTagTypes()
      Loads user tag types from disk.

    • addUserTagType

      public static void addUserTagType(String username, String tagTypeName, boolean restricted)
      adds a custom tag type for a specific user
      Parameters:
      username - the user to add the tag type for
      tagTypeName - the tag type to add

    • saveUsersList

      public static void saveUsersList()
      Saves the users list to disk.

    • isRestrictedTagType

      public static boolean isRestrictedTagType(String username, String tagTypeName)
      Method to check if a tag type is restricted for a certain username
      Parameters:
      username - username of user whose tags we're checking for restrictions
      tagTypeName - tag type we're checking to see if restricted
      Returns:
      whether or not tag type is restricted

    • loadUsersList

      public static void loadUsersList()
      Loads the usersList from disk

    • initializeUserAlbums

      public static void initializeUserAlbums()
      Initializes user albums with empty album maps for each user.

    • createAlbum

      public static void createAlbum(String username, String albumName)
      Creates a new album for a user if it doesn't already exist
      Parameters:
      username - the user
      albumName - the album name

    • addExistingPhoto

      public static void addExistingPhoto(String username, String albumName, Photo photo)
      adds a reference to an existing Photo object to another album
      Parameters:
      username - the user
      albumName - the album
      photo - the existing Photo object

    • addPhoto

      public static void addPhoto(String username, String albumName, String photoPath)
      adds a new photo to the album using the file path. Reuses an existing photo if it exists and belongs to the same user.
      Parameters:
      username - the user
      albumName - the album
      photoPath - the file path of the photo

    • findPhotoInUserAlbums

      public static Photo findPhotoInUserAlbums(String username, String photoPath)
      Finds a photo in a specific user's albums by path
      Parameters:
      username - the user
      photoPath - the photo path
      Returns:
      the Photo object, or null if not found

    • findPhotoByPath

      public static Photo findPhotoByPath(String path)
      Finds a photo in all albums belonging to all users by path
      Parameters:
      path - the file path of the photo
      Returns:
      the Photo object, or null if not found

    • addDate

      public static void addDate(String username, String albumName, String photoPath, String date)
      adds a user-facing display date to a photo
      Parameters:
      username - the user
      albumName - the album
      photoPath - the photo path
      date - the date string to add

    • addRealDate

      public static void addRealDate(String username, String albumName, String photoPath, String dateStr)
      Adds a real calendar date for searching/sorting to a photo
      Parameters:
      username - the user
      albumName - the album
      photoPath - the photo path
      dateStr - the date string in "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss" format

    • addTag

      public static void addTag(String username, String albumName, String photoPath, String tag)
      Adds a tag to a photo
      Parameters:

      albumName - the album
      photoPath - the photo path
      tag - the tag to add

      albumName - the album
      photoPath - the photo path

      Removes a user and their albums from the system.

      Parameters:
      username - the user
      albumName - the album to remove

      public static void removePhoto(String username, String albumName, String photoPath)
      Removes a photo from the specified album.
      Parameters:
      username - the user
      albumName - the album
      photoPath - the path of the photo to remove
